Package eu.monnetproject.sim

Similarity measures

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CrosslingualSimilarityMeasureFactory<T>
    Creates cross-lingual similarity measures
    CrosslingualStringSimilarityMeasureFactory
    A factory for cross-lingual string similarity measures.
    EntitySimilarityMeasure
    Measure calculating the similarity between two ontology entities
    SimilarityMeasure<T>
    Measure calculating the similarity between two types
    StringSimilarityMeasure
    Measure calculating the similarity between two String values
    TokenSimilarityMeasure
    Measure calculating the similarity between two lists of tokens
